attributes.action: reduce the alcohol drinking age to 16, but raise age to clubs and pubs to 21 or remain at 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: reducing age will make alcohol more available, reducing the need for young people to try and drink alcohol underage purly because it is aganst the law, keeping the age for pub will keep young people out of more dangerouse places whilst consuming alcohol. Reducing age will also stop young people from trying to hide themselves in dangerouse places when drinking in, such as abandoned factories. climbing security fences of school grounds and such

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
